means: （疑问副词）关于什么，（关系副词）关于那事（人，物），以什么的

sentence.Network_en: They were the earliest poets whereof there is record.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们是有记载的最早的诗人.

sentence.Network_en: In acknowledgement whereof I have hereunto affixed my signature.
sentence.Network_cn: 下面是我的签名,确认我的誓言.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(W1)|无忧教育 ... whereinto 向那 whereof 关于什么 whereon 如何.
上海翻译公司整理-商务英语词汇 ... quantity 数量；大量 whereof 关于那个 line 线；生产线；排，行.
副词 ... Whereupon 在谁身上 whereof 关于那事 No 不是的.
六级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... whale n. 鲸；庞然大物 whereof ad. 什么的,关于什么的,以什么的 whereon ad. 在什么上面,在那上面.

list.abs: a writ of right of dower whereof the ., 分之一的房地产的权利状.
then there is this wildness whereof it is spoken .于是，就有一个声音表达的自由度问题。
in witness whereof , the undersigned fully understood the contents the contract stated , and agreed to sign this contract .在证人的见证下，合同的签名者充分理解合同的内容和条例，并同意签署这合同。
Like coral insects multitudinous . The minutes whereof our life is made ., 就象无以计数的珊瑚虫那样 , 我们的一生是由分分秒秒构成的.

sentences.sentence: "punishment for a crime whereof he was convicted"

auth_sentence.content: A Protestant Militia of 25,000, the most whereof are expert in war.

auth_sentence.content: I would you would make use of your good wisdom, Whereof I know you are fraught.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I would you would make use of your good wisdom, Whereof I know you are fraught.

auth_sentence.content: Why, there they are, both baked in this pie, Whereof their mother daintily hath fed.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why, there they are, both baked in this pie, Whereof their mother daintily hath fed.
